subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: This section describes the **ODataContext**'s configuration properties.

subMembers.name: beforeSend
subMembers.description: Specifies a function that customizes the request before it is sent to the server.

subMembers.name: deserializeDates
subMembers.description: Specifies whether stores in the **ODataContext** serialize/parse date-time values.

subMembers.name: entities
subMembers.description: Specifies entity collections to be accessed.

subMembers.name: errorHandler
subMembers.description: Specifies a function that is executed when the **ODataContext** throws an error.

subMembers.name: filterToLower
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to convert string values to lowercase in filter and search requests. Applies to the following operations: *"startswith"*, *"endswith"*, *"contains"*, and *"notcontains"*.

subMembers.name: jsonp
subMembers.description: Specifies whether data should be sent using JSONP.

subMembers.name: url
subMembers.description: Specifies the URL of an OData service.

subMembers.name: withCredentials
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to send cookies, authorization headers, and client certificates in a cross-origin request.

properties.name: ODataContext
properties.description: The **ODataContext** is an object that provides access to an entire OData service.

Methods.name: get(operationName_params)
Methods.description: Invokes an OData operation that returns a value.

Methods.name: invoke(operationName_params_httpMethod)
Methods.description: Invokes an OData operation that returns nothing.

Methods.name: objectLink(entityAlias_key)
Methods.description: Gets a link to an entity with a specific key.
